#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long int n,m,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
        if(n%2==1 && m%2==1)
        {
            if(m==1 && n==1)
            printf("0/1\n");
            else
                {
           n=n*m;
           m=n-1;
           n=2*n;
               if(m%2==0)
            printf("%lld/%lld\n",m/2,n/2);
            else if(n%m==0)
                printf("1/%lld\n",n/m);
            else
                printf("%lld/%lld\n",m,n);
           }
        }
       else
            printf("1/2\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
